org.openliberty.openaz.azapi.pep
Interface PepRequest

public interface PepRequest

A wrapper around the AzRequestContext that also provides the decide method that sends the request to the pdp and returns a PepResponse.

Author:
Josh Bregman, Rich Levinson, Prateek Mishra

Method Summary
 PepResponse decide()
          Calls the AzService for a decision and returns the information to the caller in the form of a PepResponse
 java.lang.Object getActionObject(AzResourceActionAssociation azRaa)
          Helper method to return the action object from the initial request based on the AzResourceActionAssociation that was created for that action object.
 AzRequestContext getAzRequestContext()
          This method is used to allow access to the underlying AzRequestContext that was created by the PepRequestFactory.
 PepRequestOperation getOperation()
          Return the PepRequestOperation for the current PepRequest, which is the type of request: a single decide, a bulk request, or a query.
 PepRequestFactory getPepRequestFactory()
          Returns the PepRequestFactory object that was used to create this PepRequest.
 java.lang.Object getResourceObject(AzResourceActionAssociation azRaa)
          Helper method to return the resource object from the initial request based on the AzResourceActionAssociation that was created for that resource object.
 java.lang.String getScope()
          Returns the "scope" that was set if this is a query type request PepRequestOperation.
 boolean isQueryForAllowedResults()
          Returns a boolean indicating whether the results indicate what is allowed (true) or not allowed (false).
 void setAccessSubject(java.lang.Object subjectObject)
          Sets the Subject based on the mapping of the native Java object passed containing Subject information.

          Set multiple resource and action pairs for this request using a list of actions and a list of resources, where both lists must be of equal length.

          Sets the Environment based on the mapping of the native Java object passed containing the Environment information.

          Sets the boolean to true if only a Set of Allowed decisions are to be returned, and false if only a Set of Denied decisions is to be returned.

          Set the resource and action for this PepRequest.
 void setScope(java.lang.String scope)
          Sets the scope for this request.
 

Method Detail

decide

PepResponse decide()
                   throws PepException
Calls the AzService for a decision and returns the information to the caller in the form of a PepResponse

Returns:
a PepResponse object
Throws:
PepException - if there was an error in processing the request. There is some ability by the PepResponseFactory to determine under what circumstances (i.e. XACML results and status codes) to throw an exception.
See Also:
PepResponse, PepResponseFactory

getAzRequestContext

AzRequestContext getAzRequestContext()
This method is used to allow access to the underlying AzRequestContext that was created by the PepRequestFactory. It contains all of the state, so any changes made against it are in no way reflected in any of the objects in the pep package

Returns:
the handle to the AzRequestContext

getOperation

PepRequestOperation getOperation()
Return the PepRequestOperation for the current PepRequest, which is the type of request: a single decide, a bulk request, or a query.

getScope

java.lang.String getScope()
Returns the "scope" that was set if this is a query type request PepRequestOperation. i.e. if this request was created using PepRequestFactory.newQueryPepRequest(Object, Object, String, org.openliberty.openaz.azapi.constants.PepRequestQueryType), where the String argument contains the scope.

Returns:
a string if this is a query type PepRequest, otherwise, null.

isQueryForAllowedResults

boolean isQueryForAllowedResults()
Returns a boolean indicating whether the results indicate what is allowed (true) or not allowed (false). The boolean is determined by the value of the PepRequestQueryType that was set in the PepRequestFactory.newQueryPepRequest(Object, Object, String, org.openliberty.openaz.azapi.constants.PepRequestQueryType) method to specify the type of results intended to be returned.

getPepRequestFactory

PepRequestFactory getPepRequestFactory()
Returns the PepRequestFactory object that was used to create this PepRequest. It is used primarily to get access to the methods of PepRequestFactory.

getActionObject

java.lang.Object getActionObject(AzResourceActionAssociation azRaa)
Helper method to return the action object from the initial request based on the AzResourceActionAssociation that was created for that action object. The action object returned will be one of those that were submitted in the newPepRequest or newBulkPepRequest or newQueryPepRequest methods.

Returns:
an object from the initial list of action objects

getResourceObject

java.lang.Object getResourceObject(AzResourceActionAssociation azRaa)
Helper method to return the resource object from the initial request based on the AzResourceActionAssociation that was created for that resource object. The resource object returned will be one of those that were submitted in the newPepRequest or newBulkPepRequest or newQueryPepRequest methods.

Returns:
an object from the initial list of resource objects

setResourceAction

void setResourceAction(java.lang.Object resource,
                       java.lang.Object action)
                       throws PepException
Set the resource and action for this PepRequest.

Parameters:
resource - any resource object supported by a JavaObjectMapper
action - any action object supported by a JavaObjectMapper
Throws:
PepException

setBulkResourceActions

void setBulkResourceActions(java.util.List resourceObjects,
                            java.util.List actionObjects)
                            throws PepException
Set multiple resource and action pairs for this request using a list of actions and a list of resources, where both lists must be of equal length.

Parameters:
resourceObjects - a List of length n of resource objects
actionObjects - a List of length n of action objects
Throws:
PepException

setAccessSubject

void setAccessSubject(java.lang.Object subjectObject)
                      throws PepException
Sets the Subject based on the mapping of the native Java object passed containing Subject information.

Parameters:
subjectObject -
Throws:
PepException

setEnvironment

void setEnvironment(java.lang.Object envObject)
                    throws PepException
Sets the Environment based on the mapping of the native Java object passed containing the Environment information.

Parameters:
envObject -
Throws:
PepException

setScope

void setScope(java.lang.String scope)
Sets the scope for this request.

Parameters:
scope -
See Also:
for details on scope.

setQueryReturnAllowed

void setQueryReturnAllowed(boolean queryReturnAllowed)
Sets the boolean to true if only a Set of Allowed decisions are to be returned, and false if only a Set of Denied decisions is to be returned.

Parameters:
queryReturnAllowed -
See Also:
PepRequestFactory.newQueryPepRequest(java.lang.Object, java.lang.Object, java.lang.String, org.openliberty.openaz.azapi.constants.PepRequestQueryType)
